tags.name: radial-loader
tags.description: A component with a title and an action counter

properties.name: diameter
properties.description: The diameter of the progress bar arc in pixels

properties.name: progressBarLineWidth
properties.description: The width of the progress bar arc in pixels

properties.name: percentComplete
properties.description: Number form 0 to 100 which controls the percent complete of the progress bar arc

cssProperties.description: The color of the progress bar
